title: Επίσημη Ιστοσελίδα του Μουσείου Πικάσο
description: Εξερευνήστε τις συλλογές και τις εκθέσεις του Μουσείου Πικάσο στο Παρίσι.

title: Picasso in The Metropolitan Museum of Art
description: Picasso in The Metropolitan Museum of Art

title: Life with Picasso, by Françoise Gilot and Carlton Lake
description: Artist Françoise Gilot describes her decade-long relationship with Picasso.

title: A Life of Picasso, Vol. 1: The Early Years, 1881-1906
description: This first volume of Richardson's prodigiously detailed and documented four-volume study takes Picasso to the age of twenty-five. It reveals how the adolescent Picasso struggled, through determination and study, to escape the shadow of his father's artistic failures. It describes his precocious success in Barcelona and Paris and the period of rejection and despair that followed.

title: A Life Of Picasso: The Minotaur Years: 1933-1943
description: Richardson tells Picasso's story through the art of this period, analyzing how it reflects the tenor of the artist's day-to-day life. The fascinating, accessible narrative immerses the reader in one of the most exciting artistic moments in twentieth century cultural history, and makes a groundbreaking contribution to the scholarship of the field.
